mapper.sql: id, ip, port, types, protocol, country, area, updatetime, speed, score
mapper.insert: insert into proxies (id, ip, port, types, protocol, country, area, updatetime, speed, score) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{port,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{types,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{protocol,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{speed,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER})

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
